channel.title: When I try and run and compile my server
channel.description:
Right, when I run my server it says "Server already in use" and when I try and compile it, it says "`javac' is not recognized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue..." What should I do?
Note: I don't know if this is how you do it but I'm running and compiling in the Project16_V.3 folder, if this is not where you run and compile it where is it?
Thanks for help.
